text: Pratap K. Pothen (13 August 1952 â€“ 15 July 2022) was an Indian actor, movie director, producer and screenwriter. He was born in Kerala, India. His career began in 1978. He was known for directing the movie Rithubhedam and for starring in Thakara and Chamaram. Pothen died on 15 July 2022 at his apartment in Chennai, India one month before his 70th birthday. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian movie producers Category:Indian screenwriters Category:People from Kerala
title: Pratap Pothen
